## 1. Load libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
library(palmerpenguins)
```

## 2. load data
```{r}
penguins <- penguins
```

## 3. dimesions of penguins data
```{r}
dim(penguins)
```

## 4. get names of varaiables columns are names of variables
```{r}
names(penguins)
```

## 5. Get number of penguins in each island
```{r}
table(penguins$island)
```

## 6. get mean of data 
```{r}
meanbodymass <- penguins$body_mass_g
mean(meanbodymass, na.rm=T)
```
